title: On You
lyrics:
Let me know again
You make me feel so special
And when you come around
You take me all alone
It's the way you say my name

Hope it makes me want to stay



I wanna wake up

I wanna wake up on you

I wanna wake up

I wanna wake up on you



Say my name

Say my name



Oh, oh



Say my name

Say my name



Oh, oh



I can feel ya

I can feel ya

Let me feel ya

Let me feel ya



I can feel ya

I can feel ya

Let me feel ya

Let me feel ya



I want you on my body

Know how to make it break

I know I won't be sorry

It's the way you say my name

Hope it makes me want to stay



Let me go, let me

Let me go, let me

Let me go, let me

Let me go again



I wanna wake up

I wanna wake up on you

I wanna wake up

I wanna wake up on you



Say my name

Say my name



Oh, oh
